Symbol.Script_1D:
! iWindowType: WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 = 10 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle = 11 WIN_HistoricWindowDouble = 12 WIN_HistoricWindowTriple = 13 WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented = 14 WIN_HistoricWindowTripleArched = 15 WIN_W2HorizontalSlide = 16 WIN_W4HorizontalSlide = 17 WIN_Curved = 18 WIN_Bow = 19 WIN_SplayBay = 20 WIN_SquareBay = 21 WIN_Ribbon = 22 WIN_WSingleHung1 = 23 WIN_WSingleHung2 = 24 WIN_WSingleHung3 = 25 WIN_WDoubleHung1 = 26 WIN_WDoubleHung2 = 27 WIN_WDoubleHung3 = 28 WIN_WRound = 29 WIN_WOval = 30 WIN_WMultiside = 31 WIN_WHalfRound = 32 WIN_WQuarterRound = 33 WIN_WPentagon = 34 WIN_WTriangle = 35 WIN_WEyebrows = 36 WIN_WArched = 37 WIN_WTrapezoid = 38 WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash = 39 WIN_VentWindow = 40 WIN_2SashSliding = 41 WIN_MultisashHorizontal = 42 WIN_MultisashVertical = 43 WIN_GlassBlock = 44 WIN_TerraceDoorSWE = 45 WIN_W3HorizontalSlide = 46 WIN_W6HorizontalSlide = 47 WIN_VentilationBrick = 48 WIN_Rhomb = 49 WIN_Skewed = 50 DOOR_NoSidelight = 100 DOOR_OneSidelight = 101 DOOR_TwoSidelight = 102
! iFrameType: FRAME_FULL = 1 FRAME_CORNER = 2 FRAME_OFFSET = 3
! gs_optype_m: SASH_FIXED = 1 ! Fixed Glass SASH_FIXED_SCREW = 2 ! Fixed Sash SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 ! Side Hung SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 ! Side Hung Mirrored SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 ! Tilt and Turn SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 ! Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 ! Bottom Hung SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 ! Top Hung SASH_HOR_PIVOT = 9 ! Horizontal Pivot Hung SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10 ! Vertical Pivotted SASH_TILT_SLIDE = 11 ! Tilt and Slide SASH_LEFT_SLIDING = 12 ! Left Sliding SASH_RIGHT_SLIDING = 13 ! Right Sliding SASH_UP_SLIDING = 14 ! Sliding Up SASH_DOWN_SLIDING = 15 ! Sliding Down SASH_VER_PIVOT_M = 16 ! Vertical Pivotted Mirrored SASH_FIXED_SLIDE = 17 ! Fixed Sliding Sash SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG = 18 ! Double Sash SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN = 19 ! Double Tilt and Turn SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN_M = 20 ! Double Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_HOR = 21 ! Sliding SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M = 22 ! Sliding Mirrored SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR = 23 ! Double Sliding SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M = 24 ! Double Sliding Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_VER = 25 ! Single Hung SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER = 26 ! Double Hung
Symbol.Script_UI:
pageStartY = 3
kk=REQUEST ("Working_length_unit", "", outf_lgh) frame_wdth_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_frame_width) frame2_wdth_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_frame2_width) frame_thk_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_frame_thk) frame1_thk_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_frame1_thk) frame2_thk_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_frame2_thk) rebate_wdth_str = STR(outf_lgh, gs_rebate_width)
if iWindowType = WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 then ui_separator 210, 35, 210, 260
yCurr = pageStartY ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Тип Коробки`, 10, yCurr, 140, 18 !Frame Type ui_style 0, 0 yCurr = yCurr + 21
ui_infield{3} "iFrameType", 30, yCurr-2, 150, 18, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Полная Коробка`, 1, 2, `Угловая Коробка`, 2, 3, `Смещение Коробки`, 3 yCurr = yCurr + 20
ui_infield{3} "gs_uniform_framewidth", 10, yCurr, 200, 18, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Единая Ширина Коробки`, 0, ! Uniform Frame Width 1, `Единая Ширина Коробки`, 1 ! Uniform Frame Width
yCurr = yCurr + 21
ui_separator 10, yCurr, 200, yCurr
posX = 75 posY = 92 + pageStartY !horizontal cut if iFrameType = FRAME_OFFSET then ui_pict "x_offset_frame_horiz(1)", posX, posY, 102, 110, 1
ui_infield "gs_rebate_width", posX+22, posY-23, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Паза` ! Rebate Width ui_infield "gs_frame2_thk", posX-60, posY+27, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Продления Коробки` ! Frame Extension Thickness ui_infield "gs_frame_width", posX+15, posY+112, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Width ui_infield "gs_frame1_thk", posX-60, posY+47, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Thickness
else ui_infield "gs_frame2_width", posX-15, posY-23, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки` ! Frame Extension Width ui_infield "gs_rebate_width", posX+45, posY-23, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Паза` ! Rebate Width ui_infield "gs_frame2_thk", posX-60, posY+13, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Продления Коробки` ! Frame Extension Thickness ui_infield "gs_frame_width", posX+15, posY+112, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Width
if iFrameType = FRAME_FULL then ui_pict "x_full_frame_horiz(1)", posX, posY, 102, 110, 1 endif if iFrameType = FRAME_CORNER then ui_pict "x_corner_frame_horiz(1)", posX, posY, 102, 110, 1 ui_infield "gs_frame1_thk", posX-60, posY+38, 55, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Thickness endif endif
!vertical cut posX = 275 posY = 5 + pageStartY if gs_uniform_framewidth then ui_outfield frame_wdth_str, posX-32, posY+184, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Width else ui_infield "gs_frame_width_lower", posX-57, posY+181, 55, 18 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Width endif ui_outfield frame_wdth_str, posX-32, posY+24, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Внизу` ! Frame Width
if not(gs_uTrans and gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED) then ui_outfield rebate_wdth_str, posX+113, posY+30, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Паза` ! Rebate Width endif ui_outfield rebate_wdth_str, posX+113, posY+176, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Паза` ! Rebate Width
if gs_uTrans then ui_infield "gs_UTrans_w", posX+113, posY+102, 55, 18 ui_tooltip `Ширина Средника` ! Width of Horizontal Division endif if iFrameType = FRAME_OFFSET then if gs_uTrans then if gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED then ui_pict "x_offset_frame_fix(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 else ui_pict "x_offset_frame_transom(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif else ui_pict "x_offset_frame_wo_transom(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif else if iFrameType = FRAME_FULL then if not(gs_uTrans and gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED) then ui_outfield frame2_wdth_str, posX+113, posY+15, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки` ! Extension Frame Width endif if gs_uniform_framewidth then ui_outfield frame2_wdth_str, posX+113, posY+195, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Extension Width else ui_infield "gs_frame2_width_lower", posX+113, posY+193, 55, 18 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Extension Width endif
if gs_uTrans then if gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED then ui_pict "x_full_frame_fix(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 else ui_pict "x_full_frame_transom(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif else ui_pict "x_full_frame_wo_transom(1)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif endif if iFrameType = FRAME_CORNER then if gs_uniform_framewidth then ui_outfield frame2_wdth_str, posX+113, posY+195, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Extension Width else ui_infield "gs_frame2_width_lower", posX+113, posY+193, 55, 18 ui_tooltip `Ширина Продления Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Extension Width endif
if gs_uTrans then if gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED then ui_pict "x_corner_frame_fix(2)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 else ui_pict "x_corner_frame_transom(2)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif else ui_pict "x_corner_frame_wo_transom(2)", posX, posY, 110, 221, 1 endif endif endif else yCurr = pageStartY
ui_style 0, 0 ui_infield{3} "gs_uniform_framewidth", 10, yCurr-4, 150, 26, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, `Единая Ширина Коробки`, 0, ! Uniform Frame Width 1, `Единая Ширина Коробки`, 1 ! Uniform Frame Width
yCurr = yCurr + 25
ui_separator 10, yCurr, 157, yCurr
posX = 70 posY = 65 + pageStartY ui_separator 161, pageStartY - 2, 161, 223 + pageStartY
!horizontal cut ui_pict "normal_frame_horiz(1)", posX, posY, 84, 129, 1 ui_infield "gs_frame_thk", posX-65, posY+55, 65, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Thickness ui_infield "gs_frame_width", posX+10, posY-22, 65, 20 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Width ui_infield "gs_frame2_width", posX+15, posY+132, 65, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Наружной Коробки` ! Outer Frame Width
!vertical cut posX = 230 posY = 5 + pageStartY if gs_uniform_framewidth then ui_outfield frame2_wdth_str, posX-32, posY+162, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Наружной Коробки Внизу` ! Outer Bottom Frame Width else ui_infield "gs_frame2_width_lower", posX-63, posY+157, 62, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Наружной Коробки Внизу` ! Outer Bottom Frame Width endif ui_outfield frame2_wdth_str, posX-32, posY+24, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Наружной Коробки` ! Outer Frame Width
if gs_UTrans then ui_infield "gs_UTrans_w", posX-63, posY+85, 62, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Средника` ! Width of Horizontal Division endif ui_outfield frame_thk_str, posX+60, posY+209, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Thickness ui_outfield frame_wdth_str, posX+152, posY+20, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Толщина Коробки` ! Frame Width if gs_uniform_framewidth then ui_outfield frame_wdth_str, posX+152, posY+167, 30, 16 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Width else ui_infield "gs_frame_width_lower", posX+152, posY+163, 62, 20 ui_tooltip `Ширина Коробки Внизу` ! Bottom Frame Width endif
if gs_uTrans then if gs_optype_m_02 = SASH_FIXED then ui_pict "normal_frame_fix(1)", posX, posY, 149, 208, 1 else ui_pict "normal_frame_transom(1)", posX, posY, 149, 208, 1 endif else ui_pict "normal_frame_wo_transom(1)", posX, posY, 149, 208, 1 endif endif

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
